MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to carry out repair work to a broken pole near Hallquarter and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35am on 12th March
